solution_line_template: A bird eats {berries_per_bird_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{berries_per_bird_per_day}*{num_days}={berries_per_bird_in_4_days}>>{berries_per_bird_in_4_days} berries in 4 days.
So, {num_birds} birds can eat {berries_per_bird_in_4_days} x {num_birds} = <<{berries_per_bird_in_4_days}*{num_birds}={total_berries_eaten}>>{total_berries_eaten} berries in 4 days.
